parameters.name: RowStart
parameters.description: Index of row at which start the merge

parameters.name: ColumnStart
parameters.description: Index of column at which to start the merge

parameters.name: RowEnd
parameters.description: Index of row at which to end the merge

parameters.name: ColumnEnd
parameters.description: Index of column at which to end the merge

title: ITableAnnotation.MergeCells
description: Merges the cells in the specified range.
signature:
System.Boolean MergeCells( 
   System.Int32
RowStart
,
   System.Int32
ColumnStart
,
   System.Int32
RowEnd
,
   System.Int32
ColumnEnd
)

parameters.name: RowStart
parameters.description: Index of row at which start the merge

parameters.name: ColumnStart
parameters.description: Index of column at which to start the merge

parameters.name: RowEnd
parameters.description: Index of row at which to end the merge

parameters.name: ColumnEnd
parameters.description: Index of column at which to end the merge

returns: True if the cells in the specified range merge successfully, false if not
remarks: The index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
